revision.text:
clearscope double '''GetGravity''' () const
==Usage== Gets the current [[gravity]] of the actor.
===Return value=== The function returns the result of multiplying the level's {{MapProperty|Gravity|gravity}} with the gravity of the [[sector]] in which the calling actor is in, the calling actor's {{Property|Gravity|gravity}} and 0.00125. If the calling actor has the {{Flag|NOGRAVITY}} flag, the function returns 0.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[Category:DECORATE]] [[Category:ZScript]]
